statements.select:
/* EntrprsUserDac.SelectEntrprsUserList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* ,ROWNUM AS "RowNumber" ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS "TotalCount" FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID AS "UserId" /* 사용자ID */ , A.ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" /* 기업일련번호 */ , B.ENTRPRS_NM AS "EntrprsNm" /* 기업명 */ , A.USER_NM AS "UserNm" /* 사용자명 */ , A.TELNO AS "Telno" /* 전화번호 */ , FN_CRYPTO(A.MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /* 휴대폰번호 */ , A.EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /* 이메일주소 */ , A.MNGR_AT AS "MngrAt" /* 관리자여부 */ , A.ENTRPRS_USER_STTUS_CODE AS "EntrprsUserSttusCode" /* 기업사용자상태코드 */ , A.REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , A.REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , A.UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , A.UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , A.REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.REGISTER_SE_CODE, A.REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE, A.UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ FROM TN_ENTRPRS_USER A ,TN_ENTRPRS B WHERE B.ENTRPRS_SN = A.ENTRPRS_SN
AND A.ENTRPRS_USER_STTUS_CODE = #SearchEntrprsUserSttusCode# /* 기업사용자상태코드 */
AND A.ENTRPRS_SN = #SearchEntrprsSn# /* 기업일련번호 */
AND B.ENTRPRS_NM LIKE #SearchEntrprsNm# || '%' /* 기업명 */
AND A.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사용자명 */
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사용자ID */
AND A.TELNO LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 전화번호 */
AND FN_CRYPTO(A.MBTLNUM,'D') LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 휴대폰번호 */
AND A.EMAIL_ADRES LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 이메일주소 */
ORDER BY A.ENTRPRS_SN ASC, A.USER_ID ASC ) A ) WHERE "RowNumber" BETWEEN #StartIndex# AND #EndIndex#

/* EntrprsUserDac.SelectEntrprsUser */ SELECT A.USER_ID AS "UserId" /* 사용자ID */ , A.ENTRPRS_SN AS "EntrprsSn" /* 기업일련번호 */ , B.ENTRPRS_NM AS "EntrprsNm" /* 기업명 */ , A.USER_NM AS "UserNm" /* 사용자명 */ , A.TELNO AS "Telno" /* 전화번호 */ , FN_CRYPTO(A.MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /* 휴대폰번호 */ , A.EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /* 이메일주소 */ , A.MNGR_AT AS "MngrAt" /* 관리자여부 */ , A.ENTRPRS_USER_STTUS_CODE AS "EntrprsUserSttusCode" /* 기업사용자상태코드 */ , A.REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , A.REGISTER_ID AS "RegisterId" /* 등록자ID */ , A.UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ , A.UPDUSR_ID AS "UpdusrId" /* 수정자ID */ , A.REGISTER_SE_CODE AS "RegisterSeCode" /* 등록자구분코드 */ , A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE AS "UpdusrSeCode" /* 수정자구분코드 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.REGISTER_SE_CODE, A.REGISTER_ID) AS "RegisterNm" /* 등록자명 */ , FN_USER_NM(A.UPDUSR_SE_CODE, A.UPDUSR_ID) AS "UpdusrNm" /* 수정자명 */ FROM TN_ENTRPRS_USER A ,TN_ENTRPRS B WHERE B.ENTRPRS_SN = A.ENTRPRS_SN AND A.USER_ID = #UserId#
statements.insert: /* EntrprsUserDac.InsertEntrprsUser */ INSERT INTO TN_ENTRPRS_USER ( USER_ID ,ENTRPRS_SN ,USER_NM ,TELNO ,MBTLNUM ,EMAIL_ADRES ,MNGR_AT ,ENTRPRS_USER_STTUS_CODE ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDUSR_ID ,REGISTER_SE_CODE ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE ) VALUES ( #UserId# ,#EntrprsSn# ,#UserNm# ,#Telno# ,FN_CRYPTO(#Mbtlnum#,'E') ,#EmailAdres# ,#MngrAt# ,#EntrprsUserSttusCode# ,SYSDATE ,#RegisterId# ,SYSDATE ,#UpdusrId# ,#RegisterSeCode# ,#UpdusrSeCode# )
statements.update:
/* EntrprsUserDac.UpdateEntrprsUserSttusCode */
UPDATE TN_ENTRPRS_USER SET ENTRPRS_USER_STTUS_CODE = #EntrprsUserSttusCode# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,UPDUSR_ID = #UpdusrId# WHERE USER_ID = #UserId#

/* EntrprsUserDac.UpdateEntrprsUser */
UPDATE TN_ENTRPRS_USER SET ENTRPRS_SN = #EntrprsSn# ,USER_NM = #UserNm# ,TELNO = #Telno# ,MBTLNUM = FN_CRYPTO(#Mbtlnum#,'E') ,EMAIL_ADRES = #EmailAdres# ,MNGR_AT = #MngrAt# ,ENTRPRS_USER_STTUS_CODE = #EntrprsUserSttusCode# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,UPDUSR_ID = #UpdusrId# ,UPDUSR_SE_CODE = #UpdusrSeCode# WHERE USER_ID = #UserId#
